requirement_tested: Display personal information section with name, contact details, and professional summary
user_persona: A recruiter browsing an online CV to evaluate a candidate's profile.
user_goal: To quickly find the candidate's name, contact information, and professional summary.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Website
narrative_steps.description: The recruiter opens the CV website and expects to see the personal information section right away.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Personal Information' section is displayed prominently with the name in large text, followed by email, phone, address, and a professional summary, all styled with light pink background and medium violet red headers.

requirement_tested: Show work experience section with job titles, companies, dates, and responsibilities
user_persona: A hiring manager reviewing a candidate's career progression.
user_goal: To assess the candidate's previous roles, responsibilities, and employment timeline.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Work Experience
narrative_steps.description: The hiring manager scrolls down or clicks the navigation link to view the candidate's work history.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Work Experience' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page scrolls smoothly to the 'Work Experience' section, which displays each job with title, company, date range, and bullet-pointed responsibilities, styled consistently with light pink background and medium violet red headers.

requirement_tested: Present skills section with categorized technical and soft skills
user_persona: A technical lead evaluating a candidate's competencies.
user_goal: To identify whether the candidate possesses relevant technical and interpersonal skills.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Skills Section
narrative_steps.description: The technical lead looks for the skills section to review the candidate’s abilities.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll or click on the 'Skills' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Skills' section loads with two distinct subsections: 'Technical Skills' and 'Soft Skills', each listing relevant items in a clean layout, styled with the correct colors and background.

requirement_tested: Include education background section with degrees, institutions, and dates
user_persona: An HR representative verifying educational qualifications.
user_goal: To confirm the candidate’s academic credentials and graduation timeline.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Education Details
narrative_steps.description: The HR rep navigates to the education section to validate the candidate's academic history.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Education' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Education Background' section appears, showing degrees, institutions, and date ranges in a clear, chronological format with consistent styling.

requirement_tested: Feature projects section with project titles, descriptions, technologies, and links
user_persona: A portfolio reviewer interested in seeing hands-on work examples.
user_goal: To explore the candidate’s past projects and the technologies they used.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Projects
narrative_steps.description: The reviewer clicks on the 'Projects' section to see examples of the candidate's work.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Projects' section via scroll or menu click.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Project cards are displayed with titles, descriptions, technologies used, and clickable links, all styled according to design guidelines.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Project Link
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by one project, the reviewer clicks on it to view more details externally.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser navigates to the external project URL specified in the project data.

requirement_tested: Implement responsive navigation menu to access different CV sections
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the CV on a smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate smoothly between sections despite limited screen space.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Menu on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: The user opens the site on a mobile device and uses the navigation menu to jump to the skills section.
narrative_steps.action: Open the site on mobile and tap the 'Skills' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The menu adapts responsively to the mobile screen, and clicking the link scrolls the page smoothly to the 'Skills' section.

narrative_steps.title: Active Section Highlighting
narrative_steps.description: As the user scrolls manually through sections, they expect visual feedback on which section is active.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The navigation bar updates to highlight the currently visible section as the user scrolls.

requirement_tested: Apply light pink background color throughout the website
user_persona: A designer checking brand consistency across the website.
user_goal: To ensure the entire website has a uniform light pink background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background Color
narrative_steps.description: The designer inspects various sections of the site to verify the background color remains consistent.
narrative_steps.action: Visit all major sections of the website.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every section of the website displays a consistent light pink background (#FFB6C1) as defined in the CSS.

requirement_tested: Use medium violet red color for UI components like buttons, headers, and links
user_persona: A UI/UX reviewer validating visual consistency.
user_goal: To confirm that interactive elements and headers use the correct accent color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking UI Component Colors
narrative_steps.description: The reviewer scans the page to verify headers, links, and buttons use medium violet red.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect headers, buttons, and links visually or via developer tools.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All headers, buttons, and links are styled with medium violet red (#C71585) as per the CSS rules.

requirement_tested: Ensure all content is fetched dynamically from backend APIs
user_persona: A developer testing the integration between frontend and backend.
user_goal: To confirm that no static or hardcoded data is shown and everything comes from the API.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Dynamic Content Load
narrative_steps.description: The developer opens the network tab and reloads the page to inspect data fetching behavior.
narrative_steps.action: Reload the CV homepage and monitor network activity.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Multiple GET requests are made to /api/personal-info, /api/work-experience, etc., and content renders only after successful API responses.

requirement_tested: Set up backend server connecting to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables
user_persona: A DevOps engineer deploying the application.
user_goal: To ensure the backend connects securely and correctly to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: The engineer starts the backend server and checks for successful database connection logs.
narrative_steps.action: Run the backend server with the specified environment variables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend initializes successfully and logs indicate a healthy connection to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.

requirement_tested: Create RESTful API endpoints for personal info, work experience, skills, education, and projects
user_persona: A frontend developer integrating with backend services.
user_goal: To consume accurate and accessible data from defined API endpoints.

narrative_steps.title: Testing API Endpoints
narrative_steps.description: The developer sends GET requests to each endpoint to verify data retrieval.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each endpoint responds with valid JSON data matching its respective database table schema.

requirement_tested: Design database schema with tables for personal info, work experience, skills, education, and projects
user_persona: A database administrator validating schema implementation.
user_goal: To ensure that the database contains properly structured tables with correct fields.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Database Tables
narrative_steps.description: The DBA connects to the PostgreSQL instance and reviews table structures.
narrative_steps.action: Query the database for table schemas of personal_info, work_experience, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All five tables exist with the correct column names, types, and constraints as defined in the schema.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'install:all' script to install frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A new team member setting up the project locally.
user_goal: To easily install all necessary dependencies with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: The developer clones the repo and runs the install script to set up dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed successfully without errors.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'dev' script to start frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer beginning daily work on the project.
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend servers efficiently for local development.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: The developer wants to start both servers with one command for convenience.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend development servers start concurrently and are accessible in the browser and terminal.

requirement_tested: Implement consistent typography and spacing for readable content presentation
user_persona: A content strategist ensuring readability and accessibility.
user_goal: To verify that all textual content is presented in a clean, legible format.

narrative_steps.title: Evaluating Typography and Spacing
narrative_steps.description: The strategist inspects the visual presentation of all text sections for consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Browse all CV sections and observe font styles and spacing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All headings and paragraphs use Arial font with consistent line height and proper margin spacing as defined in CSS.
